newsitem.title: USA: Core Industries names financial officer.
newsitem.headline: Core Industries names financial officer.

text.p: Core Industries Inc said Monday that Mark MacGuidwin joined the company as vice president of finance and chief financial officer, effective immediately.
He succeeds Raymond Steben, who left the company earlier in the year.
MacGuidwin had been vice president-controller of Varity Corp, which previously merged with Lucas Industries Plc to form LucasVarity Plc.
Core Industries makes specialty products in the fluid control and construction products; test, measurement and control, and specialty farm equipment segments.
